oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Department of Energy Photograph Collection
Bill Pollock and Burrel Henry at radio station
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: One man seated at table adjusting a radio dial and another man is standing in front of a microphone. Another couple is in background.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Interiors; Music; Radio broadcasting; Radios; Singing
Block, Seymour; Harmon, Ruth; Henry, Burrel; Pollock, Bill
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: See Oak Ridge Journal article of November 23, 1945. Bill Pollock is seated while Burrel Henry is at the microphone. Ruth Harmon and Seymour Block are the couple seen in the window, according to an article in The Oak Ridger of August 19, 1997.
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: Physical rights are retained by the institution. Copyright is retained in accordance with U. S. Copyright laws.
